title: Honey Wheat Oat Flour Bread Machine Bread
directions: Place warm water, milk, oil, honey, salt, oats, oat flour, wheat flour, baking flour, and yeast in the pan of a bread machine in the order listed.
Set cycle for light crust according to manufacturer's instructions.
ingredients: 3/4 cup water (80 degrees F/27 degrees C)
3/4 cup milk (80 degrees F/27 degrees C)
